text:
A large bunch of Bollywood celebrities could be seen enjoying and this included Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, Karan Johar, Malaika Arora, Arjun Kapoor, Jacqueline Fernandez, Karisma Kapoor, Vidya Balan, Disha Patani, Ayan Mukerji, Manish Malhotra and Rajkumar Hirani among others.
According to a report in Mid-Day, a source has confirmed that Anushka is all set to use the land to build a veterinary hospital along with an animal shelter. Anushka also wants to build a bungalow for her parents at the same land in the name of her father Retd. Colonel Ajay Kumar Sharma.

In the wake of the tensions that rising between India and Pakistan, Pakistani actress Mahira Khan who was seen in Shah Rukh Khan starrer Raees said that there is nothing more uglier than the war, and that she hopes better sense will prevail. Here’s what she tweeted.
18 years after making her debut with the Karan Johar movie, she is all set to return to the world of films. For the uninitiated, Malvika Raaj is the niece of actress Anita Raj.
Tanushree Dutta is bringing Bollywood’s sexual harassment stories to screen with her upcoming short film titled Inspiration, which will be released on March 8 to mark International Women’s Day, claim reports.
title: Anushka To Open Animal Shelter, Coldplay-Chainsmokers Perform At Ambani Bash And More From Ent
description: These Videos Of Chainsmokers-Coldplay Performing At The Ambani Bash Will Give You A Major FOMO! A large bunch of Bollywood celebrities could be seen enjoying and this included Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, Karan Johar, Malaika Arora, Arjun Kapoor, Jacqueline Fernandez, Karisma Kapoor, Vidya Balan, Disha Patani, Ayan Mukerji, Manish Malhotra and Rajkumar Hirani among others.
